title.rendered: Notice of Sale of POST BASIC MIDWIFERY Application Form

content.rendered:
The Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria has granted approval to College of Nursing and Midwifery, st. Paul to commence POST BASIC MIDWIFERY programme at Nana Babajo School of Midwifery, Malumfashi effective from September 2021 intake.

Consequently, the sale of Online Application Form for admission into POST BASIC MIDWIFERY programme commences from Monday 9th August and ends on Friday 27th August 2021.

Cost of Form: Five Thousand One Hundred Naira ₦5,100 (excluding bank charges)

Method of Application

1. Visit the College website: www.st. Paul.edu.ng
2. Click on “Online Application Form”
3. Click on “Application Instructions” to read and follow the application guidelines for the Online Application.

NOTE

1. Post Basic Midwifery programme is NOT for Secondary School leavers.
2. It is an 18-month programme for Registered Nurses seeking to be trained and registered as Midwives.
3. Applicant MUST must be a Registered Nurse with current practicing licence and upload it on the portal.

Support Line
09083024636, 07086711766, 07081704416, 07061098321, 07037795016
Email: st. Pauls@gmail.com
